vote.text: Amendment SA 3450 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3450 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Reid. (consideration: CR 12/31/2012 S8586; text: CR 12/31/2012 S8586) To amend the title.
